## Page.pageTemplate property

The Page Template used to render the Page.

The Page Template can be set explicitly on the Page or be inherited from the containing Structure Group: "StructureGroup.DefaultPageTemplate".

**Signature:**

```typescript
get pageTemplate(): Link | undefined;
```
